deforestationExplanation.title: Deforestation Calculation
deforestationExplanation.formulaText: The formula for calculating the deforestation percentage considers the ratio between the deforested area according to the reference map and the total area of the polygon.
deforestationExplanation.deforestationFreeExplanation: Indicates that there has been no intervention that has caused the reduction of natural forest within the evaluated polygon, according to official maps or recognized methodologies.
deforestationExplanation.withDeforestationExplanation: Quantifies the degree of deforestation or loss of forest cover of the evaluated polygon, according to the used reference map.
